description:
German packaging: Probiona Kulturen Komplex

The Nature Love Probiona culture complex capsules provide 20 different bacterial cultures and 20 billion colony-forming units (CFU) at the recommended daily dose. In addition, the product contains inulin from organic farming.

The live bacteria are freeze-dried and are only rehydrated upon contact with liquid. The enteric-coated capsules ensure that the bacteria reach the intestine alive.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules a day with plenty of water. There are enough capsules in the package to last for 2 months.


Important facts:


	20 live bacterial cultures, including prebiotic cultures
	20 billion colony-forming units per daily dose (2 capsules)
	With organic inulin from agave (food for the bacterial cultures)
	Raw material from Italy
	Free from undesirable additives
	Produced in Germany

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian,     WITHOUT Gelatin,     WITHOUT Dye,     FREE FROM Preservatives,     Made WITHOUT Flavourings,     NO Added Sugar,     FREE FROM Magnesium Stearate

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:
Constant stress and tension have negative effects on the digestive organs, often causing vital intestinal bacteria to die. This product is ideal to support your nerves during stressful phases. Nine specifically selected bacterial strains can regulate the intestinal flora and prevent the colonization of germs. Ideal for a pleasant feeling when you wake up each morning.

Recommended use:


	Stir 1 sachet into approx. 125 ml of water 1 - 2 times a day.
	Wait for at least 1 minute for the mixture to activate, stir again and then drink.


Tips:


	Take on an empty stomach.
	If the powder is taken twice a day, it is recommended to use it before breakfast and before dinner.
	In cases of fructose intolerance, the activation time should be extended to at least 30 minutes.


Notes:


	Free from animal protein, gluten, yeast & lactose.
	Suitable for diabetics, for people with milk allergies, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.
	Food supplements for special medical purposes (a balanced diet).

productTitle: DAILY Gut Powder, Mixed Berries (240 g)
description:
The DAILY GUT Powder by BRAINEFFECT is back with a new and improved recipe in a space-saving pack. With 12 billion live bacterial cultures and 6 g of fibre per serving, it is the ideal addition to your daily diet. The formulation contains bifido and lactic acid bacteria because these bacteria also occur naturally in the gut. It is fortified with important vitamins such as B1, B6 and B12.


	With Bifidobacterium & Lactobacillus
	Soluble fibre from maize (corn) & acacia fibres
	Optimised with vitamins B1, B6 and B12
	No added sugar
	With natural aromas for a natural taste
	No flavour enhancers. Naturally vegan
	DAILY GUT includes a digital 'Well-Being Coach'
	In a resealable, space-saving bag


It can be enjoyed in many ways. Enjoy the powder as a drink, in your smoothie or with classic breakfast options.

Recommended dose:
Stir 2 heaped teaspoons (8 g = daily portion) into water, muesli, a smoothie or yoghurt in the morning before breakfast and enjoy.
Please note:
The small white sachet in the pack is not meant for consumption - it has been included to guarantee the perfect environment for the bacteria.

Note:


	Not recommended for children or those who are pregnant or breastfeeding
	One pack of DAILY GUT contains 30 portions.
	DAILY GUT should be taken regularly for at least 30 days.
	Once open, use it up within 3 months.
	Store in a cool, dry place away from light.
	The manufacturer recommends keeping the small white sachet unopened in the pack to ensure the perfect environment for the bacteria.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Vegan,     Vegetarian,     Reduced Plastic,     NO Added Sugar

description:
These capsules contain a mixture of 12 certified species of microorganisms. Over 25 billion CFU per capsule provides the highest amount of microorganisms that can be encapsulated. The capsules are perfect for use when travelling. 

Recommended use:


	Adults: take 1 capsule once a day with food or as directed by a doctor. The capsule can be opened, and the contents can be taken separately. 


Note:


	Store at 6 - 8 degrees in a cool, dry place.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Shellfish-Free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Peanut-Free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
These capsules consist of a mixture of Bacillus coagulans and B. subtilis species. Each capsule provides a 2 billion colony-forming unit. In addition, the Bacillus species is resistant to high temperatures, enzymes and gastric acid. Also ideal for vegetarians.

Consumption recommendation:
Take 1 capsule once a day

Hints:


	Only use the originally closed can
	Please keep cool and dry

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Shellfish-Free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Peanut-Free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
Lactobacillus L-Reuteri Capsules - This dietary supplement from American Biologics provides five billion colony forming units of the natural microorganism strain. The capsules also contain acacia fibre powder. Perfect in everyday life.

Consumption recommendation:
1 capsule twice a day.

Hints:


	This product contains a desiccant to ensure quality. Under no circumstances should this be consumed.
	Please keep cool and dry.

features: Can be used while taking antibiotics
description:
This probiotic is perfect for use while you're taking antibiotics. A variety of carefully selected, carefully composed bacterial strains that can rebalance imbalances in the intestines. Perfect for a pleasant feeling in your gut.

Recommended use:


	Stir 1 sachet twice a day into approx. 125 ml of water, wait for at least 1 minute for the mixture to activate, then stir again and drink.
	Children up to 3 years old can take half of this dose.


Tips:


	After taking antibiotics, take 1 sachet once a day for 14 days if possible. Ideally, there should be an interval of at least 1 hour between taking the OMNi-BiOTiC® and the antibiotic.
	Take on an empty stomach if possible.
	In cases of fructose intolerance, the activation time should be extended to at least 30 minutes.


Information:


	50g package: 10 sachets of 5g
	150g package: 30 sachets of 5g


Notes:


	Free from animal-based protein, gluten, yeast & lactose.
	Suitable for diabetics, milk allergy sufferers, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.
	This supplement is meant for special supplementation when you need a balanced diet.

German packaging: Lactobacillus Darmbakterien 10in1

Lactobacillus capsules contain 10 different strains of Lactobacillus in just one capsule. They also contain:


	30 billion living bacteria,
	Algae & calcium
	Organic acacia fibres
	Fibre


Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily with plenty of liquid.

Special probiotics L.Rhamnosus plus contains 4 healthy intestinal flora bacterial strains:


	40% Lactobacillus casei
	40% Lactobacillus rhamnosus
	10% Lactobacillus paracasei
	10% Lactobacillus salivarius


Recommended use: 


	take 1 capsule 2 times daily after a meal with plenty of fluid.

The ESSENTIALS Guard capsules from BRAINEFFECT contain bacterial strains and are enriched with B vitamins. Thanks to a plant-based capsule shell, they are also suitable for vegans.

Consumption recommendation:
Take 2 capsules unchewed once a day (morning OR evening) with sufficient liquid with a meal.

These capsules are pure and have an optimally dosed recipe.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily whole and with enough water with a meal

features: Made without the release agent magnesium stearate
description:
The Darmflora Vital complex contains 16.2 billion microencapsulated CFU from 12 active intestinal bacteria per daily dose. The formula contains the bacterial strains Lactobacilli, Bifidobacteria and Lactococci, optimized with inulin.


	The capsules do not contain the release agent magnesium stearate. In addition, the preparation is free from other unnecessary additives and free from allergens.


Recommended use: 


	Take 2 capsules daily with 1-2 glasses of water (300-400 ml) each.


Notes: 


	Not suitable for children and young people.
	Consult a doctor before use if you're pregnant or nursing.
	Consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who have insufficient fluid intake should be very careful when they take these tablets.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian

description:
The product contains the following perfectly matched, colony forming units (CFU):


	Lactobacillus acidophilus
	Bifidobacterium lactis
	Lactobacillus salivarius
	Lactobacillus casei
	Bifidobacterium bifidum
	Streptococcus thermophilum


Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily between meals.


Please note:


	This product does not require cold storage in order to maintain its viability.
	Natural colour variations in the capsules may occur.
	May contain traces of milk and soy!
	Formerly called Probiotic G.I.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
LifeLight's MicroLife 6 Intestinal Bacteria is a high-quality drinking powder with 6 combined intestinal bacterias enriched with vitamin D.


	The total bacterial count per daily dose (2 g) is 2 billion units.


Recommended use:


	Add two scoops of powder (2 g) with the provided measuring spoon to a glass of water or juice and stir. Drink after 15 minutes (preferably before going to bed).

These vegetarian capsules contain freeze-dried lactic acid bacteria (Lactobacillus acidophilus) and citrus pectin. Ideal as a yeast-free and natural alternative.


	Each capsule contains 40 million freeze-dried lactic acid bacteria


Consumption recommendation:
Take 1 capsule twice a day

Specially selected and scientifically researched bacterial strains regulate imbalances in the intestine. They multiply and permanently settle in the intestines. In combination with a balanced diet and sufficient exercise, they can increase well-being. Ideal for a feeling of lightness.

Recommended use:


	Stir 1 sachet in 125 ml of water once a day, wait at least 1 minute for activation, stir again and then drink.
	Take before breakfast or in the evening just before going to bed.


Tips:


	In cases of fructose intolerance, extend the activation time to at least 30 minutes.
	Keep an eye on your calorie intake.
	It is recommended that you increase your caloric needs via exercise.


Notes:


	Free from animal protein, gluten & yeast.
	Suitable for diabetics, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.

features: Contains an extremely high number of viable germs
Stomach acid and gallic acid resistant
description:
German packaging: Lactobac Darmbakterien


	The Lactobac intestinal bacteria are lactose-free lactic acid bacteria. One capsule contains 15 billion Lactobacillus Acidophilus.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule daily with liquid
	Also suitable for pregnant and nursing women
	Store cool and dry, do not store above room temperature

Orthiflor Original contains seven types of lactic acid bacteria.

Recommended use:


	Take 1-3 capsules per day with plenty of water on an empty stomach, preferably at bedtime.
	For the best results, dissolve the contents of the capsule(s) in half a glass of lukewarm water. Let it rest for at least 15 minutes, then stir and drink.

features: Especially for pregnant people and babies
description:
Long-term studies have led to the combination of three scientifically tested bacterial strains that specifically cover the needs of pregnant women and babies. Make sure your intestines have a healthy bacteria colony from the start of your pregnancy, giving your baby a good start in a healthy life. 

Recommended use:


	Adults:

	
		Stir 1 sachet into approx. 125 ml of water once a day, wait at least 10 minutes for it to activate, stir again and then drink.
		Take on an empty stomach.
	
	
	Babies:
	
		Stir 1 sachet into 1 tablespoon of breast milk or boiled water once a day and pour the mixture directly into the baby's mouth with a pipette.
		If the baby is not breastfed, the contents of the bag can also be stirred into their bottle.
	
	


Tips:


	For pregnant women, take the product from the 8th month of pregnancy on at the latest.
	For babies, daily use is recommended throughout the first year of life.


Notes:


	Do not heat the vial above 40 ° C.
	Free from hormones, animal protein, gluten, yeast & lactose
	Suitable for diabetics, people with milk allergies, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.

An unhealthy diet, stress or medication can really throw off the bacteria in our guts. This product compensates for dysbioses with the help of six naturally occurring bacterial cultures in the human intestine and makes it easier to remove toxins and waste from the body. At the same time, the bacterial strains work to create new vital substances to rebalance the body.

Recommended use:


	Stir 1 measuring spoon full 1 - 2 x daily into 125 ml water, wait at least 10 minutes for the mixture to activate, then stir again and drink.
	Take before breakfast and/or in the evening just before going to bed.


Tip: If you are fructose intolerant, extend the activation time to at least 30 minutes.

Notes:


	Free from animal protein, gluten, yeast & lactose
	Suitable for diabetics, milk allergy sufferers, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.

Lactobac Multistamm combines probiotics with prebiotics.


	Probiotics are living microorganisms. These capsules contain 10 different strains of probiotics, with a total of approx. 30 billion living bacteria.
	Algae calcium from red algae and organic acacia fibre are also included in the capsules and are prebiotics. Known for their high-quality dietary fibre, they serve as a food source for the microorganisms.


The following probiotic bacterial strains are included in Lactobac Multistrain:


	Bifidobacterium: animalis lactis, breve, bifidum, longum
	Lactobacillus: acidophilus, helveticus, reuteri, casei, plantarum, rhamnosus


Recommended use:


	take 1 capsule 2 times daily with sufficient liquid.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Peanut-Free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
These sachets ensure intact intestinal flora, which is very practical when travelling. Seven naturally occurring bacterial cultures capable of multiplying contribute to a pleasant gut feeling and reduce pathogens in the intestines. Perfect for a carefree and enjoyable trip!

Recommended use:


	It is best to take 1 sachet daily in the morning before breakfast for a few days before the trip.
	To do this, stir the powder into water, milk, tea or yoghurt.
	Wait at least 1 minute for the mixture to activate, stir again and then drink or eat.
	Continue this procedure throughout the journey.


Tip: If you are fructose intolerant, extend the activation time to at least 30 minutes.

Notes:


	Free from animal protein, gluten, yeast & lactose.
	Suitable for diabetics, people with milk allergies, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.

Micro-organisms in capsule form that are resistant to gastric juices - The Solgar® Microbiotic Complex combines 4 essential bacterial strains:


	Lactobacillus acidophilus
	Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus
	Bifidobacterium lactis
	Lacticaseibacillus paracasei


The capsules are 100% vegan and free from gluten, wheat and soy.

Recommended dose:
Take 1 - 2 capsules daily with meals

Note:
Please consult a doctor before taking if you are pregnant or breastfeeding, taking medication, planning a medical procedure or have been diagnosed with a medical condition.

The Pro Biotic capsules by Phytopharma contain probiotic bacterial strains of Lactobacillus, Streptococcus and Bifidobacteria. The gluten-free capsules are enriched with B vitamins.

Recommended dose:
Take 1 capsule per day.

German packaging: Probiona Kulturen Komplex

The Nature Love Probiona culture complex capsules provide 20 different bacterial cultures and 20 billion colony-forming units (CFU) at the recommended daily dose. In addition, the product contains inulin from organic farming.

The live bacteria are freeze-dried and are only rehydrated upon contact with liquid. The enteric-coated capsules ensure that the bacteria reach the intestine alive.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules a day with plenty of water. There are enough capsules in the package to last for 2 months.


Important facts:


	20 live bacterial cultures, including prebiotic cultures
	20 billion colony-forming units per daily dose (2 capsules)
	With organic inulin from agave (food for the bacterial cultures)
	Raw material from Italy
	Free from undesirable additives
	Produced in Germany

Recommended dose:
Take 1 capsule per day.

German packaging: Probiona Kulturen Komplex

The Nature Love Probiona culture complex capsules provide 20 different bacterial cultures and 20 billion colony-forming units (CFU) at the recommended daily dose. In addition, the product contains inulin from organic farming.

The live bacteria are freeze-dried and are only rehydrated upon contact with liquid. The enteric-coated capsules ensure that the bacteria reach the intestine alive.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules a day with plenty of water. There are enough capsules in the package to last for 2 months.


Important facts:


	20 live bacterial cultures, including prebiotic cultures
	20 billion colony-forming units per daily dose (2 capsules)
	With organic inulin from agave (food for the bacterial cultures)
	Raw material from Italy
	Free from undesirable additives
	Produced in Germany

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian,     WITHOUT Gelatin,     WITHOUT Dye,     FREE FROM Preservatives,     Made WITHOUT Flavourings,     NO Added Sugar,     FREE FROM Magnesium Stearate

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:
Constant stress and tension have negative effects on the digestive organs, often causing vital intestinal bacteria to die. This product is ideal to support your nerves during stressful phases. Nine specifically selected bacterial strains can regulate the intestinal flora and prevent the colonization of germs. Ideal for a pleasant feeling when you wake up each morning.

Recommended use:


	Stir 1 sachet into approx. 125 ml of water 1 - 2 times a day.
	Wait for at least 1 minute for the mixture to activate, stir again and then drink.


Tips:


	Take on an empty stomach.
	If the powder is taken twice a day, it is recommended to use it before breakfast and before dinner.
	In cases of fructose intolerance, the activation time should be extended to at least 30 minutes.


Notes:


	Free from animal protein, gluten, yeast & lactose.
	Suitable for diabetics, for people with milk allergies, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.
	Food supplements for special medical purposes (a balanced diet).

productTitle: DAILY Gut Powder, Mixed Berries (240 g)
description:
The DAILY GUT Powder by BRAINEFFECT is back with a new and improved recipe in a space-saving pack. With 12 billion live bacterial cultures and 6 g of fibre per serving, it is the ideal addition to your daily diet. The formulation contains bifido and lactic acid bacteria because these bacteria also occur naturally in the gut. It is fortified with important vitamins such as B1, B6 and B12.


	With Bifidobacterium & Lactobacillus
	Soluble fibre from maize (corn) & acacia fibres
	Optimised with vitamins B1, B6 and B12
	No added sugar
	With natural aromas for a natural taste
	No flavour enhancers. Naturally vegan
	DAILY GUT includes a digital 'Well-Being Coach'
	In a resealable, space-saving bag


It can be enjoyed in many ways. Enjoy the powder as a drink, in your smoothie or with classic breakfast options.

Recommended dose:
Stir 2 heaped teaspoons (8 g = daily portion) into water, muesli, a smoothie or yoghurt in the morning before breakfast and enjoy.
Please note:
The small white sachet in the pack is not meant for consumption - it has been included to guarantee the perfect environment for the bacteria.

Note:


	Not recommended for children or those who are pregnant or breastfeeding
	One pack of DAILY GUT contains 30 portions.
	DAILY GUT should be taken regularly for at least 30 days.
	Once open, use it up within 3 months.
	Store in a cool, dry place away from light.
	The manufacturer recommends keeping the small white sachet unopened in the pack to ensure the perfect environment for the bacteria.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Vegan,     Vegetarian,     Reduced Plastic,     NO Added Sugar

description:
These capsules contain a mixture of 12 certified species of microorganisms. Over 25 billion CFU per capsule provides the highest amount of microorganisms that can be encapsulated. The capsules are perfect for use when travelling. 

Recommended use:


	Adults: take 1 capsule once a day with food or as directed by a doctor. The capsule can be opened, and the contents can be taken separately. 


Note:


	Store at 6 - 8 degrees in a cool, dry place.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Shellfish-Free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Peanut-Free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
These capsules consist of a mixture of Bacillus coagulans and B. subtilis species. Each capsule provides a 2 billion colony-forming unit. In addition, the Bacillus species is resistant to high temperatures, enzymes and gastric acid. Also ideal for vegetarians.

Consumption recommendation:
Take 1 capsule once a day

Hints:


	Only use the originally closed can
	Please keep cool and dry

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Shellfish-Free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Peanut-Free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
Lactobacillus L-Reuteri Capsules - This dietary supplement from American Biologics provides five billion colony forming units of the natural microorganism strain. The capsules also contain acacia fibre powder. Perfect in everyday life.

Consumption recommendation:
1 capsule twice a day.

Hints:


	This product contains a desiccant to ensure quality. Under no circumstances should this be consumed.
	Please keep cool and dry.

features: Can be used while taking antibiotics
description:
This probiotic is perfect for use while you're taking antibiotics. A variety of carefully selected, carefully composed bacterial strains that can rebalance imbalances in the intestines. Perfect for a pleasant feeling in your gut.

Recommended use:


	Stir 1 sachet twice a day into approx. 125 ml of water, wait for at least 1 minute for the mixture to activate, then stir again and drink.
	Children up to 3 years old can take half of this dose.


Tips:


	After taking antibiotics, take 1 sachet once a day for 14 days if possible. Ideally, there should be an interval of at least 1 hour between taking the OMNi-BiOTiC® and the antibiotic.
	Take on an empty stomach if possible.
	In cases of fructose intolerance, the activation time should be extended to at least 30 minutes.


Information:


	50g package: 10 sachets of 5g
	150g package: 30 sachets of 5g


Notes:


	Free from animal-based protein, gluten, yeast & lactose.
	Suitable for diabetics, milk allergy sufferers, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.
	This supplement is meant for special supplementation when you need a balanced diet.

German packaging: Lactobacillus Darmbakterien 10in1

Lactobacillus capsules contain 10 different strains of Lactobacillus in just one capsule. They also contain:


	30 billion living bacteria,
	Algae & calcium
	Organic acacia fibres
	Fibre


Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily with plenty of liquid.

Special probiotics L.Rhamnosus plus contains 4 healthy intestinal flora bacterial strains:


	40% Lactobacillus casei
	40% Lactobacillus rhamnosus
	10% Lactobacillus paracasei
	10% Lactobacillus salivarius


Recommended use: 


	take 1 capsule 2 times daily after a meal with plenty of fluid.

The ESSENTIALS Guard capsules from BRAINEFFECT contain bacterial strains and are enriched with B vitamins. Thanks to a plant-based capsule shell, they are also suitable for vegans.

Consumption recommendation:
Take 2 capsules unchewed once a day (morning OR evening) with sufficient liquid with a meal.

These capsules are pure and have an optimally dosed recipe.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily whole and with enough water with a meal

features: Made without the release agent magnesium stearate
description:
The Darmflora Vital complex contains 16.2 billion microencapsulated CFU from 12 active intestinal bacteria per daily dose. The formula contains the bacterial strains Lactobacilli, Bifidobacteria and Lactococci, optimized with inulin.


	The capsules do not contain the release agent magnesium stearate. In addition, the preparation is free from other unnecessary additives and free from allergens.


Recommended use: 


	Take 2 capsules daily with 1-2 glasses of water (300-400 ml) each.


Notes: 


	Not suitable for children and young people.
	Consult a doctor before use if you're pregnant or nursing.
	Consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who have insufficient fluid intake should be very careful when they take these tablets.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian

description:
The product contains the following perfectly matched, colony forming units (CFU):


	Lactobacillus acidophilus
	Bifidobacterium lactis
	Lactobacillus salivarius
	Lactobacillus casei
	Bifidobacterium bifidum
	Streptococcus thermophilum


Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily between meals.


Please note:


	This product does not require cold storage in order to maintain its viability.
	Natural colour variations in the capsules may occur.
	May contain traces of milk and soy!
	Formerly called Probiotic G.I.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
LifeLight's MicroLife 6 Intestinal Bacteria is a high-quality drinking powder with 6 combined intestinal bacterias enriched with vitamin D.


	The total bacterial count per daily dose (2 g) is 2 billion units.


Recommended use:


	Add two scoops of powder (2 g) with the provided measuring spoon to a glass of water or juice and stir. Drink after 15 minutes (preferably before going to bed).

These vegetarian capsules contain freeze-dried lactic acid bacteria (Lactobacillus acidophilus) and citrus pectin. Ideal as a yeast-free and natural alternative.


	Each capsule contains 40 million freeze-dried lactic acid bacteria


Consumption recommendation:
Take 1 capsule twice a day

Specially selected and scientifically researched bacterial strains regulate imbalances in the intestine. They multiply and permanently settle in the intestines. In combination with a balanced diet and sufficient exercise, they can increase well-being. Ideal for a feeling of lightness.

Recommended use:


	Stir 1 sachet in 125 ml of water once a day, wait at least 1 minute for activation, stir again and then drink.
	Take before breakfast or in the evening just before going to bed.


Tips:


	In cases of fructose intolerance, extend the activation time to at least 30 minutes.
	Keep an eye on your calorie intake.
	It is recommended that you increase your caloric needs via exercise.


Notes:


	Free from animal protein, gluten & yeast.
	Suitable for diabetics, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.

features: Contains an extremely high number of viable germs
Stomach acid and gallic acid resistant
description:
German packaging: Lactobac Darmbakterien


	The Lactobac intestinal bacteria are lactose-free lactic acid bacteria. One capsule contains 15 billion Lactobacillus Acidophilus.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule daily with liquid
	Also suitable for pregnant and nursing women
	Store cool and dry, do not store above room temperature

Orthiflor Original contains seven types of lactic acid bacteria.

Recommended use:


	Take 1-3 capsules per day with plenty of water on an empty stomach, preferably at bedtime.
	For the best results, dissolve the contents of the capsule(s) in half a glass of lukewarm water. Let it rest for at least 15 minutes, then stir and drink.

features: Especially for pregnant people and babies
description:
Long-term studies have led to the combination of three scientifically tested bacterial strains that specifically cover the needs of pregnant women and babies. Make sure your intestines have a healthy bacteria colony from the start of your pregnancy, giving your baby a good start in a healthy life. 

Recommended use:


	Adults:

	
		Stir 1 sachet into approx. 125 ml of water once a day, wait at least 10 minutes for it to activate, stir again and then drink.
		Take on an empty stomach.
	
	
	Babies:
	
		Stir 1 sachet into 1 tablespoon of breast milk or boiled water once a day and pour the mixture directly into the baby's mouth with a pipette.
		If the baby is not breastfed, the contents of the bag can also be stirred into their bottle.
	
	


Tips:


	For pregnant women, take the product from the 8th month of pregnancy on at the latest.
	For babies, daily use is recommended throughout the first year of life.


Notes:


	Do not heat the vial above 40 ° C.
	Free from hormones, animal protein, gluten, yeast & lactose
	Suitable for diabetics, people with milk allergies, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.

An unhealthy diet, stress or medication can really throw off the bacteria in our guts. This product compensates for dysbioses with the help of six naturally occurring bacterial cultures in the human intestine and makes it easier to remove toxins and waste from the body. At the same time, the bacterial strains work to create new vital substances to rebalance the body.

Recommended use:


	Stir 1 measuring spoon full 1 - 2 x daily into 125 ml water, wait at least 10 minutes for the mixture to activate, then stir again and drink.
	Take before breakfast and/or in the evening just before going to bed.


Tip: If you are fructose intolerant, extend the activation time to at least 30 minutes.

Notes:


	Free from animal protein, gluten, yeast & lactose
	Suitable for diabetics, milk allergy sufferers, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.

Lactobac Multistamm combines probiotics with prebiotics.


	Probiotics are living microorganisms. These capsules contain 10 different strains of probiotics, with a total of approx. 30 billion living bacteria.
	Algae calcium from red algae and organic acacia fibre are also included in the capsules and are prebiotics. Known for their high-quality dietary fibre, they serve as a food source for the microorganisms.


The following probiotic bacterial strains are included in Lactobac Multistrain:


	Bifidobacterium: animalis lactis, breve, bifidum, longum
	Lactobacillus: acidophilus, helveticus, reuteri, casei, plantarum, rhamnosus


Recommended use:


	take 1 capsule 2 times daily with sufficient liquid.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Peanut-Free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
These sachets ensure intact intestinal flora, which is very practical when travelling. Seven naturally occurring bacterial cultures capable of multiplying contribute to a pleasant gut feeling and reduce pathogens in the intestines. Perfect for a carefree and enjoyable trip!

Recommended use:


	It is best to take 1 sachet daily in the morning before breakfast for a few days before the trip.
	To do this, stir the powder into water, milk, tea or yoghurt.
	Wait at least 1 minute for the mixture to activate, stir again and then drink or eat.
	Continue this procedure throughout the journey.


Tip: If you are fructose intolerant, extend the activation time to at least 30 minutes.

Notes:


	Free from animal protein, gluten, yeast & lactose.
	Suitable for diabetics, people with milk allergies, children, pregnant and breastfeeding people.

Micro-organisms in capsule form that are resistant to gastric juices - The Solgar® Microbiotic Complex combines 4 essential bacterial strains:


	Lactobacillus acidophilus
	Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus
	Bifidobacterium lactis
	Lacticaseibacillus paracasei


The capsules are 100% vegan and free from gluten, wheat and soy.

Recommended dose:
Take 1 - 2 capsules daily with meals

Note:
Please consult a doctor before taking if you are pregnant or breastfeeding, taking medication, planning a medical procedure or have been diagnosed with a medical condition.

The Pro Biotic capsules by Phytopharma contain probiotic bacterial strains of Lactobacillus, Streptococcus and Bifidobacteria. The gluten-free capsules are enriched with B vitamins.

Recommended dose:
Take 1 capsule per day.

German packaging: Probiona Kulturen Komplex

The Nature Love Probiona culture complex capsules provide 20 different bacterial cultures and 20 billion colony-forming units (CFU) at the recommended daily dose. In addition, the product contains inulin from organic farming.

The live bacteria are freeze-dried and are only rehydrated upon contact with liquid. The enteric-coated capsules ensure that the bacteria reach the intestine alive.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules a day with plenty of water. There are enough capsules in the package to last for 2 months.


Important facts:


	20 live bacterial cultures, including prebiotic cultures
	20 billion colony-forming units per daily dose (2 capsules)
	With organic inulin from agave (food for the bacterial cultures)
	Raw material from Italy
	Free from undesirable additives
	Produced in Germany

Take 1 - 2 capsules daily with meals

Note:
Please consult a doctor before taking if you are pregnant or breastfeeding, taking medication, planning a medical procedure or have been diagnosed with a medical condition.

The Pro Biotic capsules by Phytopharma contain probiotic bacterial strains of Lactobacillus, Streptococcus and Bifidobacteria. The gluten-free capsules are enriched with B vitamins.

Recommended dose:
Take 1 capsule per day.
